import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import {Link } from 'react-router-dom' import UserDetails from "./UserDetails"; import { ToursContext } from "../../context/ToursContext"; export default function BookingDetails() { const [ticket, setTicket] = useState(0); const increaseTicket = () => setTicket(ticket + 1); const decreaseTicket = () => setTicket(ticket > 0 ? ticket - 1 : 0); const {toursData} =useContext(ToursContext); return ( <>

  • Pregnant women, families with strollers, and visitors on crutches can buy priority tickets at the venue

<>

<>
); } export const Counter = () => { const [ticket, setTicket] = useState(0); const increaseTicket = () => setTicket(ticket + 1); const decreaseTicket = () => setTicket(ticket > 0 ? ticket - 1 : 0); return(<>
